name: reel
description: Reels experience with controls and progress indicators.

files.content:
"use client" import { Reel, ReelContent, ReelControls, ReelItem, ReelMuteButton, ReelNavigation, ReelNextButton, ReelPlayButton, ReelPreviousButton, ReelProgress, ReelVideo, } from "../../../../../packages/reel" const reels: ReelItem[] = [ { id: 1, type: "video", src: "https://wajxiz6qhqyqkm0o.public.blob.vercel-storage.com/grok-imagine-1.mp4", duration: 6, title: "Updated Grok Imagine Demo 1", description: "Updated First demo video", }, { id: 2, type: "video", src: "https://wajxiz6qhqyqkm0o.public.blob.vercel-storage.com/grok-imagine-2.mp4", duration: 6, title: "Updated Grok Imagine Demo 2", description: "Updated Second demo video", }, { id: 3, type: "video", src: "https://wajxiz6qhqyqkm0o.public.blob.vercel-storage.com/grok-imagine-3.mp4", duration: 6, title: "Updated Grok Imagine Demo 3", description: "Updated Third demo video", }, ] const Example = () => ( {(reel) => ( )}
) export default Example
